title: Borders, 1795–1804
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
dimensions:
A. Warp: 25cm (9 1/4in.) Weft: 25.5cm (10in.) (selv. on left)
B. Warp: 26cm (10 1/4in.). Weft: 25cm (9 3/4in.)
description: Two pieces of the border of a 'Pompeian Style' printed fabric. Similar to 1995-50-251a,b but a different design. The field had a design of animal spots. Two reds and black on a strong yellow.

tombstone.epitaph:
Borders, 1795–1804.
1795–1804. Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-252-a,b.
